metadata.name: Black Flash
metadata.description:
Black Flash is a song that accepts and expresses some of the shadow of my subconscious mind.  I tied my expression to the dark themes of a popular anime called Jujutsu Kaisen. The title “Black Flash” is a reference to a move and phenomenon that activates a flow state within characters in the anime. To directly quote the anime “sorcerers temporarily enter a state athletes call the zone. There is a sense of omnipotence like everything else revolves around them.”   When in this zone their source of spiritual power “cursed energy” is immensely increased. Through this song I’ve accepted some darker parts of my mind and gained a greater capacity to find flow and serve humanity from a more authentic place. With time I only see my self expressing myself with greater purpose and authenticity while having fun doing it! 

This song is released simultaneously on streaming platforms. This drop is my first NFT minted ever. To mark the moment in history and provide a collectible for our community. Thank you!
